title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: The All types dialog in JDK 1.4 shows obfuscated classes such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', etc.
OB: The obfuscated classes are displayed prominently in the Open Type dialog.
EB: Consider sorting the lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter in order to reduce the visibility of obfuscated classes. Another option is to completely filter them out from the dialog.
SR: I suggest implementing option a) and sorting the lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter.
